name: Winnie The Pooh And The Blustery Day: Activity Center
name_original: Winnie The Pooh And The Blustery Day: Activity Center
description:
Disney's Winnie The Pooh And The Blustery Day is an Interactive Storybook for children between the ages of 3 and 6. The game features a story about Winnie The Pooh and his friends, on a very blustery and rainy day in the hundred acre wood. Save your friends from the flood, and improve your reading and logic with puzzles!

Winnie The Pooh: Activity Center also includes another storybook: Disney's Animated Storybook: Winnie The Pooh & Tigger Too
